descriptions: ['DescriptionDistrict One Residences is a gated community of one, two and three bedroom apartments nestled amidst picturesque surroundings with world-class family-friendly amenities right at your doorsteps.Situated in low and mid-rise towers spanning four to sixteen stories from the ground up, these contemporary cutting-edge homes bathed in natural light streaming through ceiling to floor windows, offer stunning panoramic views of the Water Body and neighboring lush green corridors.These iconic one, two or three-bedroom homes create the perfect ambience for bespoke living and turn every day into a celebration of the exceptional.Whether you\x92re looking for views that take your breath away, the cosy comfort of a home shrouded in lush greenery or simply a place of your own by the glistening Crystal Lagoon \x96 you\x92re sure to find your ideal home at District One Residences.Amenities\x95 Crystal Lagoon & Beach Front\x95 Community & Play Parks\x95 Bicycle & Jogging Track\x95 Health Centre & Pharmacy\x95 Boardwalk & Community Hall\x95 School & Nursery\x95 Supermarket & Retail Stores\xa0Company name: Tabani Real Estate Al Furjan BranchRERA ORN: 18998 Address: Shop R01, Avenue Residence 2, Al Furjan, Dubai Office phone no: +97142408081Office fax no: Primary email: jocelyn@tabanirealestate.aeWebsite: http://tabanirealestate.ae/Company Profile:Call Mohamed Moustafa Ibrahim Aly 18998 on +971553593836 / +97142408081 or visit http://tabanirealestate.ae/ for further details']

["Description2 Bedroom, both en-suite baths
Burj Khalifa View, and Fountain View
Walk in Closets 
2.5 Bath
Fully Equipped Kitchen
Connected to Dubai Mall extension 
With Balcony
Exclusive View, Rare Layout       
Dubai is known for being a city of many successes. Boulevard Point at Downtown Dubai now sets the bar for location, luxury and investment potential. Nestled within a popular, well-established community, Boulevard Point boasts unparalleled views of The Old Town, and Downtown Dubai.
Boulevard Point in Downtown Dubai with its exclusive location residing between the Dubai Fountains alongside Mohammad bin Rashid Boulevard, provides world-class facilities including swimming pools, a fully-equipped gymnasium and direct walking access to the world's largest shopping center, Dubai Mall.
Boulevard Point is elegantly outfitted to both reflect and complement the cosmopolitan lifestyles of its inhabitants. Stone counter-tops, pendant lights and glass paneling enhance each living space with a tasteful, modern aesthetic."]
